ops.description: Bank[6][8] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // {Aeris}
Everything Shinra does seems to
make everyone miserable

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // {Aeris}
But how could those people
say those terrible things?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
My hometown used to be around here.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Barret}
It ain't here no more.
Heard it got buried
in just 4 years.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Barret}
An' it's my fault.
ALL my fault.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Barret}
There was an explosion at a reactor.{PAUSE}Shinra blamed the accident on the people.
Said it was done by a rebel faction.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Barret}
Well, I guess that's true.
But more than Shinra,
I can't forgive myself.{PAUSE}Never should've gone along
with the building of the reactor

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // {Barret}
That's why
that's why I get so pissed off!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // Not only did they take advantage of me
But I lost my wife, Myrna, too

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // {Barret}
Dyne was my best friend.
We were close ever
since we were kids

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
I never knew.
{Barret} never said a thing

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
Don't blame yourself.
We were all fooled by the promises
Shinra made back then.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
I never knew.
{Barret} never said a thing
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // We better go on!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // {Red XIII}
What do you mean 'used to'?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Yuffie}
I'm not sympathizing with {Barret}!
He never should have trusted Shinra, Inc.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // The Gold Saucer reopened.
Why don't you go play hard and
clear your heads
as well as your pockets?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // The Gold Saucer is currently closed.
The Ropeway's up and runnin', but
there's no point in goin' there.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // The Ropeway takes you
to the 'Gold Saucer'.
It's free, so don't worry about it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // Hey everyone!
If you want to go to the 'Gold Saucer',
hurry and get on!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // I'm gonna use all my life savings
before Meteor hits!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // I know how you feel,
but what if Meteor doesn't hit us?
What are you gonna do then?

dialogStrings: Ropeway Station

been through a lot of hardship

Sorry.

My hometown used to be around here.

in just 4 years.

An' it's my fault.
ALL my fault.

{Barret}
There was an explosion at a reactor.{PAUSE}Shinra blamed the accident on the people.

Well, I guess that's true.

I can't forgive myself.{PAUSE}Never should've gone along
with the building of the reactor

We were close ever
since we were kids

Everything Shinra does seems to

{Yuffie}
I'm not sympathizing with {Barret}!

{Yuffie}
I'm waiting inside.

The Ropeway takes you
to the 'Gold Saucer'.
It's free, so don't worry about it.

Hey everyone!
If you want to go to the 'Gold Saucer',
hurry and get on!

The Gold Saucer is currently closed.
The Ropeway's up and runnin', but
there's no point in goin' there.

The Gold Saucer reopened.
Why don't you go play hard and
clear your heads
as well as your pockets?

I'm gonna use all my life savings
before Meteor hits!

I know how you feel,
but what if Meteor doesn't hit us?
What are you gonna do then?
